posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 8 T205 w/HOF & Piedmont 42 - Priced Individually
posts.post_content:

CHANCE (HOF) - **SOLD**

HUGGINS (HOF) - **SOLD**
T. Jones - $25
Krause - PSA 2 **SOLD**
Olmstead - SGC 20 - **SOLD**
Reulbach - **SOLD**

Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve any cards.
One price drop to $150 on the lot before I price them individually.  Thanks for looking.
One final bump as all cards are now priced individually.  Prices are delivered.  Thanks!
pm sent on Chance, Foxen and Reulbach
